metadata.title: PM offers Eid prayers at Model Town Mosque

content.article_body: LAHORE, Jun 07 (APP): The Prime Minister (PM) Muhammad Shahbaz Sharif on Saturday offered Eid-ul-Adha prayers at the Model Town mosque, marking the religious occasion with solemnity and tradition. Accompanying the PM were his sons, Hamza Shahbaz Sharif and Salman Shahbaz Sharif along with a large number of local residents who also attended the congregational prayer. Following the Eid prayer, the PM warmly exchanged Eid greetings with his sons and fellow worshipers. A special prayer was held for the security, stability and progress of Pakistan, invoking unity and prosperity for the nation during the holy festival. The Prime Minister's presence among the public on this festive occasion was seen as a gesture of solidarity and goodwill, reflecting the spirit of Eid-ul-Adha.
